title: Cant launch leauge
body: When ever I launch league a pop up comes on my screen and says "The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005) Click okay to close the application" but this only happens when I launch league, I can open every other application on my PC without a problem, any suggestions would help

replies.body: It sounds like something went wrong with the League files on your pc. I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with the reinstall option checked to make sure you've got a clean install of the game.
okay, but should I check the clean uninstall?
You can go ahead and run it with reinstall and force repatch so that you hit both at once!
okay I did all that and my league has been working all fine for 2 days now thank you!
